item.description:
USA Climbing and Trailblazer New Haven present the 12th annual American Bouldering Series at The Connecticut Rock Gym.

Join us for a USA Climbing sanctioned bouldering competition, prizes, music, fun, and after party sponsored by Trailblazer, So Ill, Mammut, Mountain Hardwear, Prana, and more.

When: October 2nd, 2010
Time: Adult Categories 3pm | Registration: 2:30pm
Cost $30

Do I have to be a pro climber to compete? Answer: Absolutely Not! Climbers compete against other climbers in their own skill category. For example, the recreational category includes ONLY climbers competing on problems rated V0-V2.

Format: This competition is REDPOINT format which means that competitors will be able to try the problems as many times as they want. You only get credit for the climbs you complete without a fall. Your final score will be the sum of your five hardest problems.

Local comps are super fun and a really great way to meet new climbers, challenge yourself, and win some prizes. We hope you'll all come out and give it a try!
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk.
item.name: USA Climbing's ABS 12 Bouldering Competition
